title: Royal.Bounty.HD.MULTI9-ALiAS
description:
Royal Bounty HD MULTI9                        
                                (c) iosoftware                        
                                                                             
        Release date: 12/08/2015          Protection: Steam                  
        Files: 10x10.00MB                 Language: MULTI9                   
                                                                                    
     A minor update (included)                                                 
                                                                               
     - Updated game translations. Languages affected the most are              
       Polish, and German                                                      
     - Gameplay is now localized into German.                                  
                                                                               
     About This Game:                                                          
                                                                               
     Royal Bounty HD was crafted for the lovers of old adventure RPGs          
     like KingÃƒâ€ s Bounty (1990). You are an adventurer named Jim, just          
     out of the island prison. How you ended up like this is unknown.          
     You have no gold and no army. Angry Cell Guard is chasing your            
     heels. What a difficult situation! Your first quest is get away           
     from the maze and find a ship. But it is just a beginning of the          
     story. Your road lies across four huge continents, inhabited by a         
     variety of monsters. You are going to visit a desert, frozen lands,       
     go through woods and towns, and in the finale meet your old friend,       
     The Master. En route youÃƒâ€ ll have to earn money and gather an army         
     to face him fully equipped. Nevertheless, you will still need a           
     helping hand from Dragons.                                                
                                                                               
     - gorgeous, unmatched, top-class pixel art                                
                                                                               
     - true hardcore gameplay like back in the 90Ãƒâ€ s                            
                                                                               
     - 180 creature types in your army                                         
                                                                               
     - long plot featuring several endings                                     
                                                                               
     - tons of quests                                                          
                                                                               
     - well polished user interface                                            
                                                                               
                                                                               
     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~                                                      
                                                                               
     1. Unzip & Unrar                                                          
     2. Run Setup.exe                                                          
     3. Select the Languages into Menu Option                                  
     4. Have Fun!!!!                                                           
                                                                               
     Languages: English, French, German, Czech, Italian, Polish, Slovak,       
     Spanish, Russian.                                                         
                                                                               
     Ripped: -.
